author: aldredd
title: Perfect for little hands
review:
I bought this set for my 4 year old daughter, so am reviewing as a parent rather than AFOL. 

The build

The build is fairly straightforward. My daughter was able to help find the parts whilst I built it whilst she looked on excitedly. There are several components to the set, but the 'key' one is the car, which looks good for a small set car.

Play time

Once built, my daughter was all over this - she loves cars anyway, but a pink & purple Lego car? it was always going to be a hit. The bench and sign post was soon sidelined as she raced around with the car. And the best bit? No parts came off the car after a full play session in the hands of a 4 year old, so the car has been well built. Most models I build which I then let my daughter play with tend to last a couple of play sessions before I get bored of re-building it for her and are taken apart. This one has stayed in 1 piece and continues to be played with daily.

Overall opinion

Great set for younger children to play with once you've built it
